generic.openOnFileExplorer: Open folder on the file explorer
generic.author: Author
generic.tryMVL: Not liking VS Launcher? Try <link /> launcher!

generic.notImplemented: This page is not ready yet!
generic.notImplementedDesc: Come back on the next version and it may be ready!

home.title: Welcome to VS Launcher
home.description: The unofficial Vintage Story Launcher with (almost) all the features you need.

versions.areYouSureUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall this VS Version?
versions.uninstallingNotReversible: Uninstalling is not reversible but you can download the same VS Version again!
versions.noVersionFoundOnThatFolder: No VS Version found on the folder you've selected!
versions.versionSuccessfullyAdded: That VS Version was succesfully added!
versions.versionUninstallationFailed: An error ocurred while uninstalling VS Version {{version}}!
versions.searchForAGameVersion: Add an already installed VS Version
versions.missingFolderOrVersion: You've no folder selected or there is no VS Version installed on the one you've selected!
versions.versionInstalling: VS Version {{version}} is installing. Please wait for it to finish before playing!
versions.folderAlreadyInUse: That folder is already in use!
versions.noVersionsFoundDesc: Install a new one on the <link /> page!
versions.versionDeleting: That VS Version is being deleted!
versions.versionPlaying: You're already playing that VS Version!
versions.deleteWhilePlaying: You can't delete a VS Version while you're playing it!

installations.noInstallationsFoundDesc: Add a new one on the <link /> page
installations.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this Installation?
installations.deletingNotReversible: Deletion is not reversible so, if you check the delete data option, you'll not be able to restore your worlds, data and other info.
installations.installationNameMinMaxCharacters: Installation name must contain between {{min}} and {{max}} characters!
installations.folderAlreadyInUse: That folder is already in use!
installations.errorAddingInstallation: An error has ocurred while adding the Installation!
installations.errorEditingInstallation: An error has ocurred while editing the Installation!
installations.noInstallationFoundDesc: The Installation you've selected does not exists!
installations.errorDeletingInstallation: An error has ocurred deleting the Installation!
installations.startParamsDesc: List of all the available start params: <link />
installations.cantUseDataPath: Start param --dataPath can't be used as it's used by VS Launcher. If you want to use another folder change it on the Installation.
installations.editWhilePlaying: You can't edit an Installation while playing it!
installations.cantDeleteWhileinUse: You can't delete this Installation while it's in use!
installations.name: Name
installations.mesaGlThreadDesc: Enable to run the game with mesa_glthread. This may boost the performance on some Linux systems.

mods.noMatchingFilters: There are no Mods that match your filters!
mods.installationPopupDesc: List of versions of the {{modName}} Mod
mods.noModsInstalled: You've no mods installed here! You can install some on the <link /> page!
mods.cantDeleteWhileinUse: You can't delete a Mod while it's in use!
mods.errorDeletingMod: An error has ocurred deleting the Mod!
mods.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this Mod?
mods.deletingNotReversible: Deletion is not reversible so you'll not be able to restore the Mods but you can always download them again!
mods.modsWithErrorsDescription: The next Mods have some errors and VS Launcher can not identify them!
mods.modsWithErrorsDescriptionReport: Please, report this incident on the <issues /> page or on our <discord /> server!
mods.modsWithUpdatesDescription: The next Mods have available updates that are 95% compatible with your Vintage Story Version!
mods.modsWithUpdatesDescriptionReport: If you find any Mod missmarked as updatable, please, report it on the <issues /> page or on our <discord /> server!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them them!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_zero: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_one: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mod with available updates! Click here to see it!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_two: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_few: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_many: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them!
mods.updatesAvailableInstallation_other: The selected Installation has {{count}} Mods with available updates! Click here to see them!
mods.worksOnTheVersion: Author tagged it as compatible with your selected Vintage Story Version!
mods.shouldWorkOnTheVersion: Author didn't tagged it as compatible but there is a 95% chance it will work on the selected Vintage Story Version!
mods.probablyDontWorkOnTheVersion: Author didn't tagged it as compatible and there is a 90% chance it will not work on the selected Vintage Story Version!
mods.modsWithIncompatibleUpdatesDescription: The next Mods have available updates that are 90% incompatible with your selected Vintage Story Version!
mods.cantUpdateWhileinUse: You can't update a Mod while it's in use!

config.title: Settings
config.onlyIfEnabledTwoFA: Fill this field ony if you have 2FA enabled!

backups.backupInProgress: There is a backup already in progress!
backups.backupWhilePlaying: You can't make a Backup while playing the Installation!
backups.backupsAuto: Toggle on to make an automatic Backup before playing
backups.restoreInProgress: There's a Backup restoration already in progress!
backups.areYouSureRestoreBackup: Are you sure you want to restore this Backup?
backups.restoringNotReversible: Restoring a Backup will permanently delete your data and replace it with the Backup one!
backups.cantDeleteWhileinUse: You can't delete this Backup while it's in use!
backups.errorDeletingBackup: There was an error deleting the Backup!
backups.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this Backup?
backups.deletingNotReversible: Deletion is not reversible so you'll not be able to restore your worlds, data and other info using this Backup anymore.
backups.errorMakingBackup: There was an error making a backup!
backups.folderDoesntExists: This Installation has no data, please, play on it at least one time to generate the base data!
backups.compressionLevelDesc: Higher compression takes longer but creates smaller Backups.

tasksMenu.error: An error has ocurred during the process!

loader.title: Welcome to VS Launcher!
loader.desc: We are preparing everything for you!

body.folderDoesntExists: The folder you're trying to open does not exists!
body.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded succesfully! Click here to restart VS Launcher and update it!
body.errorExecutingGame: An error has ocurred while executing the game!
body.folderNotEmpty: The folder you've selected is not empty! Make sure you've nothing important on there.
body.coulndtCopyIcon: That icon couldn't be copied to the icons folder!
